name: GITHZERAI ZERTH

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The githzerai makes two Psi Strike attacks.

actions.name: Psi Strike
actions.text: Melee Attack Roll: +7, reach 5 ft. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) Bludgeoning damage plus 13 (3d8) Psychic damage.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.text: The githzerai casts one of the following spells, requiring no spell components and using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 14): At Will: Mage Hand (the hand is Invisible) 1/Day Each: Phantasmal Killer (level 6 version), Plane Shift, See Invisibility

bonus_actions.name: Psi-Powered Leap (2/Day)
bonus_actions.text: The githzerai casts Jump, requiring no spell components and using the same spellcasting ability as Spellcasting.

reactions.name: Psionic Defense (2/Day)
reactions.text: The githzerai casts Feather Fall or Shield in response to the spell's trigger, requiring no spell components and using the same spellcasting ability as Spellcasting.
